oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Environmental monitoring in Finland 2009-2012
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Global environmental questions such as climate change have increased general concern for environmental quality. Adequate environmental data, e.g. that produced by environmental monitoring, forms a basis for addressing these problems.
Environmental monitoring has a long tradition in Finland.
In recent decades the total amount of data produced by monitoring programs has rapidly increased.
Environmental problems are increasing and require expertise from many fields of science.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Niemi, Jorma (Ed.) (2009) Environmental monitoring in Finland 2009-2012. Finnish Environment Institute.
